mapper.select: select d1.trip_detail_id, d1.image_path, s1.sido_name, d1.title, d1.start_date, d1.end_date, u1.nickname, d1.max_capacity, d1.view, d1.created_at, timestampdiff(minute, d1.created_at, now()) as created_time from trip_detail d1 join sido s1 on d1.sido_code = s1.sido_code join user u1 on d1.user_id = u1.user_id where d1.end_date < now() order by d1.view desc limit 3

select d1.trip_detail_id, d1.image_path, s1.sido_name, d1.title, d1.start_date, d1.end_date, u1.nickname, d1.max_capacity, d1.view, d1.created_at, timestampdiff(minute, d1.created_at, now()) as created_time from trip_detail d1 join sido s1 on d1.sido_code = s1.sido_code join user u1 on d1.user_id = u1.user_id where d1.start_date > now() order by d1.created_at desc limit 3
